items.sentence: Make sure you stop doing that before Tom gets here.
Let's put the basses on the left behind the cellos.
Tom didn't know that yesterday was Mary's birthday.
I wonder what would happen if I pushed this button.
Both Tom and John said they were in love with Mary.
Tom said that he hopes Mary won't let John do that.
Tom sat on a log, drinking coffee out of a tin cup.
In those days, women didn't have the right to vote.
Tom told me that you had something to do with that.
The company has changed hands at least three times.
